long_description: Covering ground in water or on the trail, Teva Churn men's water shoes offer grippy traction and quick-draining performance. Nylon mesh uppers let water flow freely from shoes and dry quickly for comfort; thermoplastic urethane overlays offer support. Drainage system in uppers allows excess water to escape in all directions, so shoes dry quickly. Durable pull cord allows quick adjustment and easy entry and exit; special pocket at top of tongue stows lace and lace lock. Fold-down, Shoc Pad(TM) heels let you wear them like slippers if you prefer. Neoprene linings help protect bare feet from pressure and abrasion, and won't hold excess water. Drain-Frame molded EVA insoles add cushioning; perforations allow water to escape so feet don't have to swim. Thin nylon shanks add stability and control underfoot. EVA midsoles absorb and transfer shock for enhanced push-off energy. Nonmarking Spider Rubber(R) outsoles deliver grippy traction on a variety of surfaces, especially in wet environments. Teva Churn men's water shoes sport outsoles with mesh drainage ports for full water expulsion.
short_description: Covering ground in water or on the trail, Teva Churn men's water shoes offer grippy traction and quick-draining performance.
